subject: Baseball
Little League World Series
lead_paragraph: Matthew Campos hit a three-run homer in a six-run fourth inning, and Waipahu, Hawaii, took advantage of wildness by Hamilton, Ohio, pitchers for a win.
snippet: Matthew Campos hit a three-run homer in a six-run fourth inning, and Waipahu, Hawaii, took advantage of wildness by Hamilton, Ohio, pitchers for a win.
